/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's organized chaos. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's architectural details.
